analysis.key_quote: The Office of Personnel Management (OPM) new proposed rule (RIN 3206-AO80) to reclassify 50,000 federal workers, is a blatant effort to make it easier to fire them for politically motivated reasons.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and its negative impact on the nonpartisan nature of the civil service, which undermines trust in government.
